connector.description: Send message to an AWS SNS FIFO Topic

camel.kamelet.aws-sns-fifo-sink.topicNam.name: camel.kamelet.aws-sns-fifo-sink.topicNameOrArn
camel.kamelet.aws-sns-fifo-sink.topicNam.description: The SNS Topic name or ARN

camel.kamelet.aws-sns-fifo-sink.accessKe.name: camel.kamelet.aws-sns-fifo-sink.accessKey
camel.kamelet.aws-sns-fifo-sink.accessKe.description: The access key obtained from AWS

camel.kamelet.aws-sns-fifo-sink.secretKe.name: camel.kamelet.aws-sns-fifo-sink.secretKey
camel.kamelet.aws-sns-fifo-sink.secretKe.description: The secret key obtained from AWS

camel.kamelet.aws-sns-fifo-sink.region.name: camel.kamelet.aws-sns-fifo-sink.region
camel.kamelet.aws-sns-fifo-sink.region.description: The AWS region to connect to Example: eu-west-1

camel.kamelet.aws-sns-fifo-sink.contentB.name: camel.kamelet.aws-sns-fifo-sink.contentBasedDeduplication
camel.kamelet.aws-sns-fifo-sink.contentB.description: Use content-based deduplication (should be enabled in the SQS FIFO queue first)

camel.kamelet.aws-sns-fifo-sink.autoCrea.name: camel.kamelet.aws-sns-fifo-sink.autoCreateTopic
camel.kamelet.aws-sns-fifo-sink.autoCrea.description: Setting the autocreation of the SNS topic.
